IMG UPDATE

You are going to update GPT (GUID Partition Table) or EMMC image starting with GPT on the device.
Please, choose file from your local hard drive and click Update IMG button.

WARNINGS
  • updating IMG is a very dangerous operation and may damage your device!
  • do not power off the device during update
  • if everything goes well, the device will restart
  • you can upload whatever you want, so be sure that you choose proper IMG image for your device
You can find more information about this project on GitHub
uboot2.0 version:2025.12.27_13:42:44
